text: Nothing in this subchapter shall limit the right of an individual to donate, sell, or otherwise dispose of his or her recyclable materials.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Solid Waste Management and Multi-Material Recycling. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Right to recycle individual solid waste not limited.
